main_page.title: ğŸŒ³ RandomForest GHG Emissions Predictor
main_page.description: This app allows you to tune hyperparameters for the RandomForest regressor that predicts GHG emissions based on economic and energy data.

sidebar.n_estimators_help: Number of trees in the forest
sidebar.unlimited_depth_help: If checked, trees will grow until all leaves are pure
sidebar.min_samples_split_help: Minimum number of samples required to split an internal node
sidebar.min_samples_leaf_help: Minimum number of samples required to be at a leaf node
sidebar.max_features_help: Number of features to consider when looking for the best split
sidebar.bootstrap_help: Whether bootstrap samples are used when building trees
